//: Blackhat Hacker that lives in the Squat.

responses.text: Heard anything about the outside world?

dynamic_line: Not That i want to sound rude or anything, but we have only just met..
Currently? Trying to fix this laptop of mine.. I know we don't have the 'net anymore, but still.. I Don't feel right without a screen in front of me.

responses.text: How Well is that going for you?

dynamic_line: Not good, it's fubar.. When all that stuff went down something messed with all my electronics.. Seems like i need a new one.

responses.text: Hmmm, maybe i could grab one for you in my travels..

dynamic_line: I appreciate the offer but they're hell to charge without the grid and you'd be hard pressed to find a working one anyway.. What you could do for me is find me a e-ink tablet PC, do that and i'll be super grateful to you.

responses.text: I'll keep an eye out for one.
It just so happens I have a spare one, if you need!

dynamic_line: That would be pretty amazing! I can't offer you much right now but i can give you some of my spare tools and i'll definetly owe you one!
Thanks!! I know it's not much, but here, take this screwdriver set, it cold come in useful and i have a spare.
